base.description: Select from the dropdown below, if you want to view settings, or update the queue/server settings

embed.author: This will time out in 2 minutes.
embed.description: Click below to pick players for your team.

embed.title: Team Selection

picking.description: Captains will now pick their team members!
picking.title: Picking Teams

vote.error: You have already voted for this!

return.description: The vote has been completed. The results are:
return.title: Voting complete!

starter.description: This message needs to have **{{count}}** player interactions to proceed!
starter.title: You have 2 minutes to vote. Vote by clicking the buttons below.

cron.remove: Players removed from the queue after inactivity

warning.description: Click below to extend the time you have in Queue!
warning.title: Players to be removed from queue in under 5 minutes!

deleteData.error:
This command can only be run in the #data-deletion-request channel in the Private 6 Mans support server.
Type /invite for an invite link to that server.

prompt.description: Are you sure you want to delete your data? This cannot be undone.
prompt.title: Delete Data

success.description: Your data has been removed from our databases.
success.title: Data Deleted

captain.dm: I can't send a DM to {{captain}}, are you allowing DMs? (Team Picking Cancelled)
captain.time: {{captain}} out of time to choose players. (Team Picking Cancelled)

VC.title: VC Creation Error:
VC.description: I can't create Voice Channels, do I have the correct permissions?

discord.title: Discord Error

missingAccess.channels: The bot is missing access to one or more channels. Please ensure the bot has the **Manage Channels** permission in the relevant category, and that no channel or category permission overrides are denying access.
missingAccess.generic: The bot is missing access to perform this action. Please check the bot's role permissions and ensure no permission overrides are blocking access.

discord.forbidden: The bot does not have permission to perform this action. Please check the bot's role position and permissions in the server settings.
discord.notFound: A resource required for this action could not be found. It may have been deleted or the bot may not have access to it.
discord.rateLimit: The bot is being rate limited by Discord. Please wait a moment and try again.

interactionCreate.embed: I can't create an embed, please fix that!

permissions.footer: I need the permissions listed above to allow me to run smoothly!
permissions.premium: You need to be a premium player to use this feature.
permissions.title: Missing Permissions:
permissions.user: You don't have permission to use this command

unknown.description: An unexpected error occurred while processing your command. Please report this in the #error-report channel in the Private 6 Mans Support Server.

match.found: No match found with that ID.
match.id: No ID provided, please provide a match ID.

queued.description: The Selected player is already in the current queue.
queued.title: Player Already Queued

command.long:
For more information about a command, run `/help command [command name]`. 
Run `/help all` to see a list of all commands.
command.short: For more information about a command, run `/help command [command name]`

data.description: In the Support server linked, go to the #data-deletion-request channel. In that channel, type /deletedata.
data.title: Want to make a request to delete your match and player data?

invite.title: Want to use the bot in your own server?

issues.description: Make sure the bot has Read Messages, Send Messages, Embed Links and Add Reactions permissions. Also make sure everyone in the lobby can receive DMs from the bot.
issues.title: Having issues?

developer.description: Only the bot developers can run this command.
developer.title: This is a **developer** command

moderator.description: Only users with the designated Private 6 Mans Moderator role, users with Administrator, or Manage Server permissions can run this command.
moderator.title: This is a **moderator** command

public.description: All users can run this command, unless they are blacklisted.
public.title: This is a **public** command

match.summary:
Match {{matchId}} has been reported!
Team {{teamId}} won, the scores have been reported. Happy Playing! 

Rating breakdown for match given below.

notPermitted.title: Player not able to join Queue

error.matchResult: No result provided, please provide a result.

reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset stats? This cannot be undone.

invalid.queued: Valid player not provided! Are they a part of the match?
invalid.replacement: Valid player not provided! Are they a part of the match already, a bot, or blacklisted?

undo.description: You can now report the score correctly.
